generated_body: The article likely reports on a tragic incident involving a Porsche that crashed into a second story of a building in New Jersey, resulting in the deaths of two individuals. Readers may expect details about the circumstances leading up to the accident, including any potential causes and the impact on the surrounding area. It could also cover the aftermath, such as investigations by local authorities and responses from witnesses. The article may provide insight into how such incidents affect community safety and vehicle regulations, though specific conclusions about responsibility or legal repercussions may not be drawn.
